item.title: 562 System Update
item.dc:creator: @danneee danneee
item.description:
@danneee wrote:

Works now ty all

code if someone else got the same problem

if(cmd[0].equals("update")) { for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if(p == null) continue; p.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(51); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 562 System Update
item.dc:creator: @danneee danneee
item.description:
@danneee wrote:

Hey when i do update in game it countsdown and work fine but that’s only for me… Noone else can see it.

What do i have to add so other people can see it aswell, this is my code.

if(cmd[0].equals("Update") & (player.getRights() > 4)) { player.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(51); }

Read full topic
